member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.GetImage(Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.Decoders.DecodingSettings,System.EventHandler{Vintasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventArgs})
member.summary: Gets an image associated with this image page.
member.param: Progress delegate.
Decoding settings used for decode the image of page.
member.returns: The image associated with this RawPage object if image was loaded successfully; null if image loading was canceled.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.Width
member.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of this image page.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.Height
member.summary: Gets the height, in pixels, of this image page.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per pixel for image returned by method.
member.remarks: Values of the and properties may be different if image data will be converted to another format during image decoding.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.Resolution
member.summary: Gets the resolution, in pixels per inch, of this image page.

member.summary: Gets the palette of this image page.

member.summary: Gets or sets the interpolation method applied to the RAW image data.

member.summary: Gets or sets the white balance method applied to the RAW image data.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.UserWhitePointForRedChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets user specified white point for red channel.
member.value: Possible value from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.
member.remarks: This value has effect only if is set to .User.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.UserWhitePointForGreenChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets user specified white point for green channel of RAW image data.
member.value: Possible value from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.
member.remarks: This value has effect only if is set to .User.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.RawImagePageBase.UserWhitePointForBlueChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets user specified white point for blue channel.
member.value: Possible value from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.
member.remarks: This value has effect only if is set to .User.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.SupportedCameras
member.summary: Contains informtaion about cameras supported by SDK.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.SupportedCameras.IsCameraSupported(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines that SDK supports camera.
member.param: Camera manufacturer.
Camera model.
member.returns: true - RAW image files of camera were tested with SDK; false - RAW image files of camera were NOT tested with SDK.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.SupportedCameras.IsCameraSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Determines that SDK supports camera.
member.param: Camera manufacturer and model divided by comma and space, for example, "CANON, EOS 5D Mark II".
member.returns: true - RAW image files of camera were tested with SDK; false - RAW image files of camera were NOT tested with SDK.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.SupportedCameras.GetSupported
member.summary: Gets an array of all supported cameras.
member.returns: An array of all supported cameras. Each string represents a camera manufacturer and model divided by comma and space, for example, "CANON, EOS 5D Mark II".

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.BayerGridInterpolationMethod
member.summary: Specifies available interpolation methods of Bayer grid.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.BayerGridInterpolationMethod.None
member.summary: RAW image data is not interpolated.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.BayerGridInterpolationMethod.Bilinear
member.summary: Bilinear interpolation is applied to the RAW image data.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.BayerGridInterpolationMethod.Vng
member.summary: Variable number of gradients (VNG) interpolation is applied to the RAW image data.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.BayerGridInterpolationMethod.Ahd
member.summary: Adaptive homogeneity-directed (AHD) interpolation is applied to the RAW image data.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.WhiteBalanceMethod
member.summary: Specifies available white balance methods.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.WhiteBalanceMethod.None
member.summary: RAW image data is not corrected.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.WhiteBalanceMethod.Auto
member.summary: Automatic white balance correction of RAW image data.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.WhiteBalanceMethod.Camera
member.summary: Camera specified white balance correction of RAW image data.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Raw.WhiteBalanceMethod.User
member.summary: User specified white balance correction of RAW image data.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.Decoders.RawDecodingSettings.UserWhitePointForBlueChannel

member.value: Possible value from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.
member.remarks: This value has effect only if is set to .User.
